feedbacks.text: After dating for only a couple of months, we decided to break up because we couldn't figure out what to do next. I was in love, but I thought it wasn't serious. Nine months went by, and now we can't imagine life without each other anymore.

I told myself that I would only start a serious relationship with a man I was ready to live my whole life with (even if we didn't get married). I was skeptical about Matcha and didn't think it was even possible to meet anyone there. But I decided to create an account and give it a try. You can see the result.
At that point, I was done with relationships and Marusya was just starting to date girls, so we were both a little nervous. But then we fell madly in love and realized we had found each other.
We met at Match during self-isolation. She's from Lafayette, Indiana, and I'm from Cleveland, Ohio. And we love each other madly.

...recently ended a toxic relationship and created a Match account to dispel my thoughts and meet someone new. We chatted for a week and decided to meet in a bar to chat live... Anyway, we're getting married on June 27.

I found the love of my life in Match, and we're getting married soon. I went on a few dates and then I met Miranda. I just couldn't help but swipe her profile to the right. I was won over by her phrase,
We chatted for about a week and went on our first date. I knew right away she was special!

I went on a lot of dates with guys from Matcha. At first it was just meetings to eat good food and have fun... After 3 years of dating, which gave me so many memories, Vlad and I got married. I met him at Match, too!
A HUGE THANK YOU for helping me meet my love! After 5 minutes of talking at the first meeting she was talking about what a beautiful wedding we would have. And yes, we got married!

When I was studying at the institute, my roommate and I loved to hang out at the Match. We did not find a no-nonsense relationship or a one-night stand, we just had fun. As you can see, where did I meet my own husband?

If you spend time alone, and you're also an introvert (like me) - don't be afraid to step out of your comfort zone. You will definitely find your person. I met my love in Match and I'm immensely grateful for it. ‚ù§
